#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

bool IsPrime(int num)
{
	if (num <= 1)
		return false;
	if (num == 2)
		return true;
	if (num % 2 == 0)
		return false;
	int sRoot = sqrt(num * 1.0);
	for (int i = 3; i <= sRoot; i += 2)
	{
		if (num % i == 0)
			return false;
	}
	return true;
}

int Primes[10000];
int a[25][25];

int main(void)
{
	int i, k = 0;
	for (i = 0; i < 8000; i++)
		if (IsPrime(i))
			Primes[k++] = i;

	int n;
	scanf("%d", &n);

	int p, j, b;
	p = 0;
	i = 0;
	j = 0;
	k = n;
	while (k > 0)
	{
		b = k;
		while (b > 0)
		{
			a[i][j] = Primes[p];
			p = p + 1;
			b -= 1;
			j += 1;
		}
		k -= 1;
		j -= 1;
		i += 1;
		b = k;
		while (b > 0)
		{
			a[i][j] = Primes[p];
			p = p + 1;
			b -= 1;
			i += 1;
		}
		b = k;
		i -= 1;
		j -= 1;
		while (b > 0)
		{
			a[i][j] = Primes[p];
			p = p + 1;
			b -= 1;
			j -= 1;
		}
		k -= 1;
		b = k;
		j += 1;
		i -= 1;
		while (b > 0)
		{
			a[i][j] = Primes[p];
			p = p + 1;
			b -= 1;
			i -= 1;
		}
		i += 1;
		j += 1;
	}

	for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
	{
		for (k = 0; k < n; k++)
			printf("%d ", a[i][k]);
		printf("\n");
	}
	
	return 0;
}
